title: Who is us?
firstElement: We are La Filuta, a guest house that has a newly build restaurant located in a small village in the foothills of the Carpathians, with easy access to the Unesco World Heritage Site Monasteries of Bucovina. Road to the village is paved and in good condition. The scenery is beautiful and the facilities outstanding. We have everything from tennis courts to sauna and our own sheepfold. The cooking is our strongest point.
secondEelement: We do our best to make our customers feel welcome, so if you want quality accommodation in Bucovina, La Filuţă pension is the standard. The cheerful and dedicated staff is at your disposal with everything, and because we are Bucovina and we like to tell you, do not be surprised if you will receive more than just tourist details.

title: Story
firstElement: La Filuta business started 20 years ago by having only a building and a total of 12 rooms  and a small traditional restaurant/canteen.
secondEelement: Now we have 3 buildings and a huge restaurant that can be used for different events like weddings.

title: Location
firstElement: We are located here: Strada Frasinului 111H, Văleni-Stânișoara 727350, Romania In the middle of the mountains, waiting for you!
